p: To assess temperature changes in Nunavut, we correlated monthly mean and annual mean temperatures versus year (1946–2015) for the 11 weather stations. Since there might have been a regime shift over this time period with a cooling period followed by a warming period (AMAP, 2012b; McBean, 2004; Przybylak, 2003; Reid et al., 2015; Throop et al., 2010), we also conducted change point analyses for each of the 11 weather stations for each of annual, June, and July mean temperatures separately using a nonlinear least squares model with a prediction formula for the change point of ( B0 + ( B1 × Year) + ( B2 × (If Year ≥ C, Then (Year − C) else 0))). All statistical analysis was conducted using JMP12 (SAS Institute, Cary, NC, USA).
